data.oai_dc:dc: The ZMAN holdings of Palaearctic Lepidoptera belong to the regalia of the collection. The size of the Lepidoptera collection, the quality of the material, and the fact that the greater majority of material has recently been expertly identified and arranged, provide this part of the collection with a high priority for digitization. Approximately 17% of this collection has now been digitised.|57,928 occurrences
